Text.Language: Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: nao#c# n~io] n~a~poctoloc: nem p~cepi n~te nimay/t/c: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, my lords and fathers the apostles, and the rest of the disciples, that He may forgive us our sins.
أطلبوا من الرب عنا ياسادتى الآباء الرسل وبقية التلاميذ ليغ?ر لنا خطايانا.
